name: df-scaf
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cscaf, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpo(s1, s2, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, cv(s0))), cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), co(cv(s1), cfv(cvsca, cv(s0)), cv(s2)))))
comment: Define the functionalization of the ` .s ` operator. This restricts the value of ` .s ` to the stated domain, which is necessary when working with restricted structures, whose operations may be defined on a larger set than the true base. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
